key.name: move-window-to-right-workspace
key.description: New Workspace Shortcut Right key binding

key.name: move-window-to-left-workspace
key.description: New Workspace Shortcut Left key binding

key.name: empty-workspace-right
key.description: Empty Workspace Shortcut key binding

key.name: empty-workspace-left
key.description: Empty Workspace Shortcut key binding

key.name: workspace-right
key.description: Reorder Workspace Right Shortcut key binding

key.name: workspace-left
key.description: Reorder Workspace Left Shortcut key binding

key.name: move-workspace-triggers-overview
key.description: Define if using the move-workspace shortcut should auto-trigger the Overview mode.

key.name: tiler-toggle
key.description: Define if the minimal-tiler features should be available, or if features and their shortcuts, should be disabled.

key.name: window-right
key.description: Slide window right

key.name: window-left
key.description: Slide window left

key.name: window-up
key.description: Slide window up

key.name: window-down
key.description: Slide window down

key.name: window-buffer
key.summary: Pixel distance away from center axis
key.description: By default, the window will be 4 pixesl offset from center axis.

key.name: resize-win
key.description: Resize Window to tiling size

key.name: window-height
key.description: By default, resize to 50% of the display width.

key.name: window-width
key.description: By default, resize to 35% of the display height.

key.name: resize-win1
key.description: Resize Window to tiling size

key.name: window-height1
key.description: By default, resize to 50% of the display width.

key.name: window-width1
key.description: By default, resize to 50% of the display height.

key.name: resize-win2
key.description: Resize Window to tiling size

key.name: window-height2
key.description: By default, resize to 50% of the display width.

key.name: window-width2
key.description: By default, resize to 15% of the display height.

key.name: resize-win3
key.description: Resize Window to tiling size

key.name: window-height3
key.description: By default, resize to 35% of the display width.

key.name: window-width3
key.description: By default, resize to 30% of the display height.
